definition: surname Yin/abbr. for 印度[Yin4 du4]
to print/to mark/to engrave/a seal/a print/a stamp/a mark/a trace/image
(used for transliteration)/old variant of 謳|讴[ou1]
Europe/abbr. for 歐洲|欧洲[Ou1 zhou1]/surname Ou

sentences.english: English and French are of the Indo-European family.
sentences.chinese: 英语和法语都属于印欧语系。

sentences.english: They speak the Kurdish language, which is a member of the Iranian branch of Indo-European languages.
sentences.chinese: 他们的语言是库尔德语，属于印欧语系伊朗语族。

sentences.english: There are large differences on linguistic properties of syntax between Chinese and some Indo-European languages like German.
sentences.chinese: 汉语与德语等印欧语言在句法特性上有很大差别。

sentences.english: However, the English vocabulary is mainly derived from the IndoEuropean languages.
sentences.chinese: 不过，英语词汇主要还是来源于印欧语系。

sentences.english: The Indo-European root that likely gave us our word number was nem.
sentences.chinese: number这个词的印欧语词根可能是nem。

sentences.english: Experts say the people in that area spoke a language called Proto-Indo-European.
sentences.chinese: 专家说那个地区的人使用一种叫做古印欧语的语言。

sentences.english: Yet, Proto - Indo - European is believed to be the ancestor of most European languages.
sentences.chinese: 但是印欧语系被认为是大多数欧洲语言的祖先。

sentences.english: English language and French language belong to Indo-European language system.
sentences.chinese: 英语和法语同属印欧语系。

sentences.english: But the word root goes back to Indo-European.
sentences.chinese: 不过，人们得把它的词根追溯到印欧语系了。

sentences.english: Consequently we have no written record of the common Indo-European language.
sentences.chinese: 因此，我们没有任何印欧语言的文字记录。

sentences.english: These are the branches of the Indo-European family tree, and we shall look briefly at each.
sentences.chinese: 这些是印欧语系分支，以下是各个语族的简介。

definition: Hamito-Semitic family of languages (incl. Arabic, Aramaic, Hebrew etc)
